Articles.Content: Here you can post everything involving the whole time paradox incident story thing that started on Chobit's art thread. HAVE FUN!

YOU WILL NEVER CATCH ME ALIVE!

*Flies away*

The day after the Paradox Incident......

(a rift in time and space opens up, sucking the Earth in. It arrives in another dimension, slowly heading towards the home of the other ShachonianX.)

ShachonianZ: Oh no, the other Earth is going to hit us! I must stop it!
ShachonianZ: I will time travel into the past to bring past ShachonianX to the present, preventing him from being killed by the paradox!
